raw_text: Similarly, CRFs were employed by one system in isolation (Settles, 2004) and by another system in combination with SVMs (Song et al, 2004)

raw_text: Settles (2004)? s CRF system deserves special note inthe sense that it achieved comparable performance to top ranked systems with a rather simple feature set
clean_text: Settles (2004)'s CRF system deserves special note in the sense that it achieved comparable performance to top ranked systems with a rather simple feature set.

raw_text: While most of earlier approaches rely on handcrafted rules or dictionaries, many recent works adopt machine learning approaches ,e.g, SVM (Lee, 2003), HMM (Zhou, 2004), Maximum Entropy (Lin, 2004) and CRF (Settles,2004), especially with the availability of annotated corpora such as GENIA, achieving state-of-the-art performance
clean_text: While most of earlier approaches rely on handcrafted rules or dictionaries, many recent works adopt machine learning approaches ,e.g, SVM (Lee, 2003), HMM (Zhou, 2004), Maximum Entropy (Lin, 2004) and CRF (Settles,2004), especially with the availability of annotated corpora such as GENIA, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

Classes of preceding NEs The machine learning techniques tried for NER include the following:? Hidden Markov Models or HMM (Zhou and Su, 2001)? Decision Trees (Isozaki, 2001)? Maximum Entropy (Borthwick et al, 1998)? Support Vector Machines or SVM (Takeuchi and Collier, 2002)?
